content:
Using the given sentence "The cat ran away," construct a complex sentence by incorporating it as a subordinate clause within a larger sentence using [Latex] data format.
While I was walking in the park, I noticed that the cat, \emph{which had run away}, was now hiding behind a tree.

Certainly! Below is the given sentence "The cat ran away" incorporated as a subordinate clause within a larger complex sentence in LaTeX format:

```latex
While I was walking in the park, I noticed that the cat, \emph{which had run away}, was now hiding behind a tree.
```
